results.title: Metformin use and the risks of herpes zoster and postherpetic neuralgia in patients with type 2 diabetes.
results.text_hl: A higher cumulative dose of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ had further lower risks of @DISEASE_Herpes_Zoster @DISEASE_MESH:D006562 @@@herpes zoster@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Neuralgia_Postherpetic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D051474 @@@postherpetic neuralgia@@@ than @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ no-use.

citations.NLM: Yen FS, Wei JC, Yip HT, Hsu CC, Hwu CM. Metformin use and the risks of herpes zoster and postherpetic neuralgia in patients with type 2 diabetes. J Med Virol. 2023 Jan;95(1):e28278. PMID: 36329608
